attributes.action: In the best interest of the U.K we demand 'All' political MPs immediately resign
attributes.additional_details:
A team of cultural experts acting on the behalf of the UK Society needs to undertake diligent research to understand what the Uk wants and needs from its politicians. 

Once these guidelines / principles have been agreed, any 'new' political party can apply to govern the country by a majority vote.

No existing party can apply.

Any political party needs to demonstrate how they will adhere to these new guidelines / principles and will be periodically audited by a 3rd party governance department.
attributes.background:
Brexit has shone a torch on our inept, self serving, egotistical, expense stealing politicians

MPs have divided society, repeatedly lied to the public and they represent their ideas not societies

The U.K needs a radical change and the only way this can happen is through a political reform.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
